article_title: 'Despite the pain' Palestinians in Gaza celebrate Eid.
sentence: Alaa  al-Eddah  similarly  tells  the  BBC  that  "sadness  overcomes  everyone"  because  of  the  record  number  of  people  who  have  been  killed.

article_title: 'Despite the pain' Palestinians in Gaza celebrate Eid.
sentence: However,  he  insists  they  will  remain  steadfast,  celebrate  Eid,  call  relatives,  and  visit  the  people  whose  loved  ones  have  been  killed.
